SelectDml:
SELECT PRODUCT_ID, name , description
 from TEST_USER.Product
SetupTempDml: declare v_sql LONG; begin v_sql:='truncate table ex8_temp_Product'; execute immediate v_sql; v_sql:='drop table ex8_temp_Product'; execute immediate v_sql; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN IF SQLCODE = -942 THEN NULL; ELSE RAISE; END IF; END;

create global temporary table ex8_temp_Product on commit preserve rows as select PRODUCT_ID, name , description
 from TEST_USER.Product where rownum <= 0;
UpdateFromTempDml:
UPDATE TEST_USER.Product 
 SET TEST_USER.Product.name = tempupdate.name,TEST_USER.Product.description = tempupdate.description from TEST_USER.Product  inner join ex8_temp_Product tempupdate on (tempupdate.PRODUCT_ID = TEST_USER.Product.PRODUCT_ID )
